nodes.text: Sernpidal was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories.

Sernpidal was first created for the novel The New Jedi Order: Vector Prime, the first book in Star Wars: The New Jedi Order multi-media project. The world was confirmed to exist in canon when it was mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game released by Fantasy Flight Games in August 2016.[source?]
